wikipedia_page.main: Howard Millar Nixon OBE (3 September 1909 – 18 February 1983) was a British librarian and historian of bookbinding. He was a librarian at the British Museum then Librarian of Westminster Abbey from 1974 until his death.

link_mentions.page: Burials and memorials in Westminster Abbey

response: *Howard Nixon, scholar of bookbinding and deputy keeper, British Museum
